import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');try{const res=await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/auth/login',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({username,password})});const data=await res.json();if(!res.ok){setError(data.error||'Erreur inconnue');return;}localStorage.setItem('token',data.token);localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(data.user));// Redirection selon le rôle
switch(data.user.role){case'admin':navigate('/dashboard/admin');break;case'ministere':navigate('/dashboard/ministere');break;case'entreprise':navigate('/dashboard/entreprise');break;default:setError("Rôle inconnu.");}}catch(err){setError("Connexion échouée.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,className:"bg-white p-6 rounded-2xl shadow-lg w-full max-w-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-6 text-center text-blue-700",children:"Connexion"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-4 text-red-600 text-sm",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block text-sm text-gray-700",children:"Nom d'utilisateur"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),className:"w-full px-4 py-2 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block text-sm text-gray-700",children:"Mot de passe"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"w-full px-4 py-2 border rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"w-full bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white py-2 rounded-lg transition duration-200",children:"Se connecter"})]})});};export default Login;
